The ECI has requested Gandhi to submit an oath-bound declaration along with his evidence to initiate a probe. The BJP has criticised Gandhi, accusing him of undermining the ECI and inadvertently supporting electoral roll revisions.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/will-rahul-gandhis-vote-theft-attack-on-election-commission-undercut-india-blocs-sir-stance-in-bihar/articleshow/123186370.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/will-rahul-gandhis-vote-theft-attack-on-election-commission-undercut-india-blocs-sir-stance-in-bihar/articleshow/123186370.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 18:10:16 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>RAJEEV SINGH</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="99408" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123188616,imgsize-99408.cms"/></item><item><title>'Tired script': EC slams Rahul's 'vote theft' claim; cites 2018 SC decision</title><description><![CDATA[The Election Commission (EC) has strongly refuted Rahul Gandhi's allegations of voter fraud, labeling them a repetition of old, baseless claims. The EC challenged Gandhi to either substantiate his accusations with formal verification or apologize to the nation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/tired-script-election-commission-slams-rahul-gandhis-vote-theft-claim-cites-2018-kamal-nath-case/articleshow/123190510.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/tired-script-election-commission-slams-rahul-gandhis-vote-theft-claim-cites-2018-kamal-nath-case/articleshow/123190510.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 19:38:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="898882" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123190638,imgsize-898882.cms"/></item><item><title>Shubman Gill's mic-drop moment: 'I want to be the best'</title><description><![CDATA[Shubman Gill's stellar performance in England, amassing 754 runs and leading as the top scorer, has garnered praise, with Dinesh Karthik highlighting his technical improvements and composed media handling. Gill addressed doubts about his overseas form with conviction, notably shining in the second Test at Edgbaston with a double century and a hundred.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/shubman-gills-mic-drop-moment-i-want-to-be-the-best/articleshow/123192564.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/shubman-gills-mic-drop-moment-i-want-to-be-the-best/articleshow/123192564.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 22:21:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="37390" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123192627,imgsize-37390.cms"/></item><item><title>Education Bill passed in Delhi Assembly; fee hikes in private schools to be regulated</title><description><![CDATA[The Delhi Assembly has passed 'The Delhi School Education (Transparency in Fixation and Regulation of Fees) Bill, 2025', granting the government more control over private school fees due to significant fee hikes in the 2025-26 academic year. Schools must now get approval for fee increases and disclose all charges, with penalties for non-compliance.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/delhi-assembly-passes-school-fee-regulation-bill-2025-rejects-aap-amendments-enforces-strict-rules-penalties-for-arbitrary-hikes/articleshow/123191971.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/delhi-assembly-passes-school-fee-regulation-bill-2025-rejects-aap-amendments-enforces-strict-rules-penalties-for-arbitrary-hikes/articleshow/123191971.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 22:00:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="212743" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123192573,imgsize-212743.cms"/></item><item><title>OpenAI CEO Sam Altman at GPT-5 launch: India is our second-largest market</title><description><![CDATA[OpenAI has launched GPT-5, its most advanced AI model, boasting significant improvements in accuracy, speed, and reasoning. CEO Sam Altman highlighted India as a rapidly growing market, potentially surpassing the US. GPT-5 is available in various sizes and tiers, including a free version, with enhanced versions for Team, Enterprise, Edu, and Pro users, marking a step towards Artificial General Intelligence.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/openai-ceo-sam-altman-at-gpt-5-launch-india-is-our-second-largest-marketbut-what-users-are-doing-with/articleshow/123178437.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/openai-ceo-sam-altman-at-gpt-5-launch-india-is-our-second-largest-marketbut-what-users-are-doing-with/articleshow/123178437.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 08:15:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="20958" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123178434,imgsize-20958.cms"/></item><item><title>'I will surrender': BJP MP Dubey after FIR filed over 'forcible' temple entry</title><description><![CDATA[BJP MP Nishikant Dubey and others, including Manoj Tiwari, face charges for allegedly forcing their way into the Baba Baidyanath temple's sanctum sanctorum in Deoghar. A priest's complaint alleges the group's actions, violating restrictions during 'Shravan,' hurt religious sentiments and caused a disturbance. Dubey claims he's being targeted for performing 'puja' and intends to surrender.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/i-will-surrender-bjp-mp-nishikant-dubey-after-fir-filed-over-forcible-temple-entry-booked-for-performing-puja/articleshow/123191372.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/i-will-surrender-bjp-mp-nishikant-dubey-after-fir-filed-over-forcible-temple-entry-booked-for-performing-puja/articleshow/123191372.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 20:56:10 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="669129" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123191604,imgsize-669129.cms"/></item><item><title>'Seems fake': EC asks Tejashwi to surrender 'false EPIC'; says 'it is a legal offence'</title><description><![CDATA[The Election Commission has declared the EPIC card presented by RJD leader Tejashwi Yadav as "fake" and demanded its submission by August 16. This action follows Yadav's demand for accountability from the EC regarding the issuance of two EPIC numbers to him.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/epic-trouble-for-tejashwi-yadav-card-shown-to-media-seems-fake-says-ec-asks-him-to-surrender-it-by-august-16/articleshow/123190633.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/epic-trouble-for-tejashwi-yadav-card-shown-to-media-seems-fake-says-ec-asks-him-to-surrender-it-by-august-16/articleshow/123190633.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 19:54:51 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="517911" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123190794,imgsize-517911.cms"/></item><item><title>Boost to defence: 200 light helicopters planned for Army & Air Force; replacing aging Chetak, Cheetah</title><description><![CDATA[The Indian Army is gearing up to replace its aging Chetak and Cheetah helicopters with 200 modern light helicopters, as indicated by the defence ministry's recent request for information. This initiative aligns with India's Aatmnirbhar Bharat campaign, emphasising indigenous defence manufacturing through partnerships between Indian companies and original equipment manufacturers.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/boost-to-defence-200-modern-light-helicopters-planned-for-army-air-force-replacing-aging-chetak-cheetah/articleshow/123191256.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/boost-to-defence-200-modern-light-helicopters-planned-for-army-air-force-replacing-aging-chetak-cheetah/articleshow/123191256.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 20:26:51 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="15616" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123191660,imgsize-15616.cms"/></item><item><title>Microsoft CEO rejects Musk's warning; highlights 50 years of competition</title><description><![CDATA[Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella has responded to Elon Musk's claim that OpenAI will 'eat Microsoft alive,' following the integration of GPT-5 across Microsoft's ecosystem. Nadella welcomed Grok 4 on Azure, emphasizing innovation and competition. Musk asserted that xAI's Grok 4 Heavy had surpassed GPT-5's intelligence, teasing Grok 5's release before 2025.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/people-have-been-trying-for-50-years-and-microsoft-ceo-satya-nadellas-on-elon-musks-warning-that-openai-is-going-to-eat-microsoft-alive/articleshow/123190543.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/people-have-been-trying-for-50-years-and-microsoft-ceo-satya-nadellas-on-elon-musks-warning-that-openai-is-going-to-eat-microsoft-alive/articleshow/123190543.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 19:47:01 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="41116" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123190543,imgsize-41116.cms"/></item><item><title>Amid standoff with US, Modi speaks to Putin, says he’ll host him this year</title><description><![CDATA[Following NSA Ajit Doval's meeting, PM Modi spoke with President Putin, inviting him to the annual India-Russia summit and reiterating India's call for a peaceful resolution to the Russia-Ukraine conflict. Putin briefed Modi on the war's developments. Both leaders reviewed bilateral progress and reaffirmed their commitment to strengthening the India-Russia partnership.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/amid-standoff-with-us-modi-speaks-to-putin-says-hell-host-him-this-year/articleshow/123190332.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/amid-standoff-with-us-modi-speaks-to-putin-says-hell-host-him-this-year/articleshow/123190332.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 19:15:12 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="994312" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123190341,imgsize-994312.cms"/></item><item><title>How to deal with Trump? He highlighted the effectiveness of Israeli weapons used in Operation Sindoor and expressed willingness to enhance India's surveillance capabilities to combat cross-border terrorism.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/will-advise-pm-modi-on-how-to-deal-with-trump-israeli-pm-benjamin-netanyahu-claims-israeli-weapons-used-in-operation-sindoor/articleshow/123185070.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/will-advise-pm-modi-on-how-to-deal-with-trump-israeli-pm-benjamin-netanyahu-claims-israeli-weapons-used-in-operation-sindoor/articleshow/123185070.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 14:52:19 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="929890" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123185373,imgsize-929890.cms"/></item><item><title>75+ heartfelt Raksha bandhan wishes, messages, and quotes for 2025</title><description><![CDATA[Raksha Bandhan celebrates the cherished bond between siblings with love, memories, and protection. This discovery opens doors for interstellar exploration. The meteorological department warned of continued rainfall. Gansu is prone to floods during the monsoon season. The disaster follows recent heavy rainfall in Beijing.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/china/torrential-rains-wreak-havoc-in-china-10-dead-33-missing-xi-calls-for-rescue-push/articleshow/123186564.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/china/torrential-rains-wreak-havoc-in-china-10-dead-33-missing-xi-calls-for-rescue-push/articleshow/123186564.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 16:02:33 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="380968" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123186930,imgsize-380968.cms"/></item><item><title>New Income-Tax Bill: Why Centre withdrew legislation from Lok Sabha</title><description><![CDATA[The Income-Tax Bill, 2025, initially introduced in February, has been withdrawn by the government to prevent confusion. His performances at Lord's and throughout the series showcased his fortitude, making him a standout performer in the drawn series.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ravindra-jadeja-more-consistent-than-shubman-gill-big-statement-shakes-up-england-series-verdict/articleshow/123185236.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ravindra-jadeja-more-consistent-than-shubman-gill-big-statement-shakes-up-england-series-verdict/articleshow/123185236.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 14:53:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="45538" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123185378,imgsize-45538.cms"/></item><item><title>Humanitarian aid: Trump 'began yelling' at Netanyahu on phone over Gaza starvation</title><description><![CDATA[A heated phone exchange occurred between Benjamin Netanyahu and Donald Trump over Gaza's humanitarian crisis, as reported by NBC News. Trump contradicted Netanyahu's denial of starvation in Gaza, citing images of hungry children. Netanyahu insisted reports were fabricated by Hamas, but Trump asserted he had seen proof of starvation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/middle-east/humanitarian-aid-row-trump-began-yelling-at-netanyahu-on-phone-over-gaza-starvation-report/articleshow/123183531.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/middle-east/humanitarian-aid-row-trump-began-yelling-at-netanyahu-on-phone-over-gaza-starvation-report/articleshow/123183531.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 13:15:12 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1744215" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123183484,imgsize-1744215.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/stocks/brigade-enterprises-share-price-launches-brigade-cherry-blossom-in-east-bengaluru-with-rs-225-crore-revenue-potential-19651232.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[The project, developed as a strategic joint venture, spans 20 acres and 11 guntas with a total development area of 4.51 lakh square feet. It comprises 338 plots offered in two configurations — 30 ft x 40 ft and 30 ft x 50 ft — aimed at meeting the needs of both homebuyers and long-term investors. Shares of Brigade Enterprises Limited ended at ₹946.85, down by ₹8.75, or 0.92%, on the BSE.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[The company reported consolidated revenue of ₹2,592.31 crore for the first quarter of FY26, up 2.1% from ₹2,539.39 crore in the same quarter of the previous fiscal.       <description><![CDATA[The Tesla deal is significant as it marks a shift for the ailing foundry business — from relying on captive internal orders to deeper external engagements, Citigroup analysts said in a report.       <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/starbucks-sales-miss-points-to-slow-turnaround-under-new-ceo-niccol-19645617.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Starbucks is trying to stage a comeback after an uncharacteristic streak of same-store sales declines over the past year and a half.
